    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneticTrainingAlgorithm

        public GeneticTrainingAlgorithm(int[] topology,
                                int numGenes,
                                double learningRate,
                                double mutation,
                                boolean classify,
                                boolean keepBest)
        Train the neural networks using a version of a genetic training algorithm.
        Parameters:
        topology - The topology of the networks in this format int[]{input, hidden1, hidden2, hiddenN, output}
        numGenes - The number of different genes per generation.
        learningRate - The amount a mutation affects the genes of the next generation.
        mutation - The percent chance of a mutation occurring: a double from 0..1 inclusive
        classify - A boolean flag specifying whether this is a classification problem.
        keepBest - A boolean flag specifying whether to keep the gene with the best fitness in the next generation without mutation.

    • Method Detail

      • getGenes

        public java.util.HashMap<NeuralNetwork,java.lang.Double> getGenes()
        Get a HashMap linking the neural networks to their fitness.
        Returns:
        A HashMap linking the nets with their fitness.

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String filename)
        Load a gene pool from a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the file containing the weight values for a neural net.

      • setFitness

        public void setFitness(NeuralNetwork net,
                       double score)
        Set the fitness of a neural network.
        Parameters:
        net - The neural network being evaluated.
        score - The fitness of the neural network.

      • getFitness

        public double getFitness(NeuralNetwork net)
        Get the fitness of a neural network.
        Parameters:
        net - The neural network being evaluated.
        Returns:
        The fitness of the neural network.

      • evolve

        public void evolve(boolean max)
        Evolve the neural networks to create the next generation.
        Parameters:
        max - A boolean flag of whether to maximize or minimize the fitness. Max is true, min is false.

      • best

        public NeuralNetwork best(boolean max)
        Get the best neural network based on its fitness.
        Parameters:
        max - A boolean flag of whether a higher fitness is better than a lower fitness. true for max, false for min.
        Returns:
        The best neural network based on its fitness.

      • bestFitness

        public double bestFitness(boolean max)
        Get the best fitness in the generation.
        Parameters:
        max - A boolean flag of whether a higher fitness is better than a lower fitness. true for max, false for min.
        Returns:
        The fitness of the best neural network.
